itunesq

Class FilterCollection

  • Object
    • FilterCollection

  • public class FilterCollection
extends Object
    Class that represents a collection of filters.

    Filters can be ANDed or ORed. In addition, subgroups of filters can exist. For example: filter1 AND filter2 AND (filter3 OR filter4)

    See the Filter class for more details on filter contents.

      Class constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • getFilters

        public List<Filter> getFilters()
        Gets the filter collection.
        Returns:
        collection of all filters as a list

      • addFilter

        public void addFilter(Filter filter)
        Adds a filter to the filter collection.
        Parameters:
        filter - filter to be added

      • getFilteredTracks

        public List<Track> getFilteredTracks()
        Gets the result list of displayable tracks.
        Returns:
        list of filtered tracks in setTableData format

      • executeFilterList

        public void executeFilterList()
                       throws FilterException
        Filters the list of tracks based on the set of filters. The resulting list of tracks can be retrieved using the getFilteredTracks method.
        Throws:
        FilterException - If an exception occurs because the filter logic is too complex.

      • getFiltersAsString

        public String getFiltersAsString()
        Returns the set of filters as a string. This is used when saving or printing the results of a query.
        Returns:
        string representation of the set of filters
